idare.metanode.internal.Interfaces

Class DataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • idare.metanode.internal.Interfaces.DataSet
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractItemDataSet, ValueSetDataSet

    public abstract class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object
    A DataSet is a storage for data. This abstract class provides several utility methods which are common to most datasets (such as the determination of some properties for datasets).
    Author:
    Thomas Pfau
